name: Sweet Tooth Blitz
description:
Tired of endlessly grinding impossible pay-to-win match 3 levels? Download and play Sweet Tooth for some easy simple casual match 3 fun just like other jeweled games! And with no lives, you can play however long you want! Match sweet candies together for points and increase your time but do it quickly or you could run out of time and lose. How long can you last? What high score can you claim? Match more than 3 in a puzzle for bonus candy points.

Features include:
●Cute sweet tooth candy graphics
●Simple design
●Match 3 and higher combos
●Race the clock by making matches quickly
●Matches generate points
●Endless infinite fun
●No lives! Play as long as you want

How to play:
●Swap orbs to arrange 3 or more in a row
●Orbs in a row will be cleared
●Clearing orbs adds score and time
●Keep clearing to reach a high score and keep the clock running
●How high can you get?

Download for free and enjoy this casual match 3 blitz! How fast can your fingers move? Only for people with a sweet tooth for fun!
